result.execSummary:
The defendant Brock A Hannawell was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Outstanding financial obligations are not a condition of probation & are to be paid directly to the Shawano Co Clerk of Court office within 30 days.  Debts older than 60 days will be processed for tax intercept & civil judgments.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Payment plans available for qualifying amounts.

Huber / work release granted for any purpose the Law allows.
Can transfer to another county if accepted.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Brock A Hannawell in court with attorney Steven Edward Weerts.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a plea of no contest to both counts.  Court advises party of their rights, finds factual basis, accepts defendant's waiver of their rights, the plea made, and finds guilty.  Arguments as to penalty.  Court imposes fines, costs and jail time.  Appeal rights.
Pre-trial conference on August 30, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Pre-trial conference on May 12, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Brock A Hannawell in court with attorney Steven Edward Weerts.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense waives reading of the complaint.  Defendant enters a plea of not guilty.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 12, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Brock A Hannawell in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Right to counsel given - defendant wishes to speak with an attorney.  Defendant is to see the public defender by 4 p.m. today.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 7, 2016 at 10:00 am.
